headline: NRG Energy Weighs LS Power Deal CEO Shift And Higher Dividend
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) secured final antitrust clearance for its planned acquisition of 18 natural gas power plants and a virtual power plant platform from LS Power. The company outlined an upcoming CEO transition, signaling changes at the top of its leadership team. NRG also announced an 8% increase to its dividend, adjusting its capital return profile to shareholders. NRG Energy enters this set of changes with shares at $155.11 and a very large 3 year return, reflecting a multiple of its...

headline: US East Power Prices Hit Records as Deep Freeze Strains Grid
summary: Arctic cold drives New York prices higher for a third day as grid operators prepare emergency measures and capacity outages mount.
